overview:
Erland is a multimedia designer and developer with over a decade of professional experience in a variety of settings, ranging from academia to e-commerce. In all fields, his work benefits from a synergistic approach, combining creativity, aesthetics, and technical ability.

His skillset includes: Branding, Copywriting, Graphic Design, HTML/CSS/PHP/MYSQL, HTML5 & CSS3, Motion Graphics, PHP, Photoshop, Print Design, SEO/SEM, User Experience Design, User Interface Design, Video Editing, Video Production, Web Design, Web Development
